title: Ticket #4938: Add missing config line in blahp lsf submit script
description: Sometime before the version we're using, the blahp's lsf_submit.sh script lost a couple lines that read in LSF's profile.lsf configuration script. A commit was recently made upstream to re-add those lines. We should patch the version we build with the same change.
remarks:
2015-Mar-13 16:41:38 by jfrey:
This bug fix was taken from this upstream commit:

git repository: https://github.com/prelz/BLAH

commit id: 35435e6613
